data.actual_result: The notification appears as if it came from a DM
data.expected_result: It's supposed to inform somehow it's from a group
data.short_description: If a group doesn't have a name, the push notification from that group, looks like a DM notification from that person who wrote
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a group with a couple of people - Don't change the group's name - Get a push notification from that group - Observe the notification
